title: Riot Kayle
body:
I just logged in to League and I saw that I was gifted Kayle the chamption which I'm guessing was by Riot. Will I also get Riot Kayle skin or will I only get the champ?

I just checked and it doesn't say that I have the skin so will I get that?

replies.body:
You should get Riot Kayle in one of the next waves that grant the gifts. We're gifting *a ton of players* this content, so it will take a bit of time for us to get it all sent out. :P

If you don't have it by 9/23, please get back to me so I can take a look.
Yes, you should also be getting the Riot Kayle skin. It will be distributed to each account up until the 23rd, with the 23rd being the final day.
oh ok thank you! I guess I got a little paranoid.
